input:
On the desk, you see a bunch of items arranged in a row: a purple puzzle, a black envelope, and a blue textbook. What is the color of the item furthest from the puzzle?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink
